price: ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߛߎ ߝߣߊ߫ ߘߐ߫ ߌ ߦߋ߫ ߕߌ߲ߓߌߘߌ߲ ߞߍ߫ ߊ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߴߌ ߦߴߊ߬ ߛߊߣߌ߲ߧߊ ߝߐ߫ ߛߎ ߞߎ߲߬ߕߊ߰ ߖߊ߲߫ ߞߘߐ߫
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ فَٱسۡجُدۡ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحۡهُ لَيۡلٗا طَوِيلًا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wamina al-layli fa-us'jud lahu wasabbiḥ'hu laylan ṭawīlan
